Pre-Game Insights: The Lakers enter this contest with a new coach in JJ Redick, who will take to the bench in this role for the first time in the NBA.
The Timberwolves have seen a major roster change just days before the preseason began as Karl-Anthony Towns got traded in a blockbuster deal to the Knicks for Julius Randle and Donte DiVincenzo.

Redick is already looking to have his entire team ready with available players to suit up in one of their first two preseason games, including LeBron James and Anthony Davis, who are coming off a busy summer with Team USA.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The LA Lakers and Minnesota Timberwolves tipoff their 2024 NBA preseason on Friday night in Palm Springs.
It's predicted to be an epic clash, seeing some of the league's best in action, including LeBron James, Anthony Davis and Anthony Edwards.
The Timberwolves are the favorites to win the preseason game with a -155 money line and -3.5-point spread.
Others: The predicted starting lineups for the Lakers and Timberwolves are listed, with notable absences including Anthony Edwards and Julius Randle for the Timberwolves, and LeBron James and Anthony Davis for the Lakers.
Predicted Starting Lineups: Lakers: PG- D'Angelo Russell, SG - Austin Reaves, SF - Max Christie, PF - Rui Hachimura, C - Jaxson Hayes
Timberwolves: PG- Mike Conley, SG - Donte DiVincenzo, SF - Jaden McDaniels, PF - Naz Reid, C - Rudy Gobert
